author: tabish
msg: fix test case after changes in https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/AMQ-4237 broke the test's MBean lookup

author: elecharny
msg: o Encaspulated the call to selector.wakeup() in the wakeup() method
o Call wakeup() in the modifyRegistration() method only when it's necessary (ie, only when the register method is not called in the select loop). This spare a spurious wakeup.
o Called the SelectedKey.readyOps() only once.

author: clin
msg: Make SMOTE-plus an option for Event Detection. One can set SMOTE off by ignoring the argument "numOfSMOTENeighbors", or giving a number less than 1.
Based on the argument, SMOTE-plus algorithm will generate a number of synthetic minority instances accordingly. The first minority instance will be a copy of original minority instance.
